bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Faulted Circuit Indicators for 200 / 600 A, Three-Phase Underground Distribution
IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Faulted Circuit Indicators for 200 / 600 A, Three-Phase Underground Distribution
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Approved Draft Std P1610/D14 Oct, 2007

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This Application Guide provides information on what a Faulted Circuit Indicator (FCI) is designed to do and describes methods for selecting FCIs for three-phase, 200 / 600 amp underground distribution circuits. This application guide will complement the existing single phase application guide.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
